approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard to allow V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency of the V-KYC team in accessing recordings.
approval_data.business_context: Currently, the V-KYC team has to request the IT data server team to provide recordings. The recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This process is manual and time-consuming.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard shall be created to provide access to V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal shall be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All V-KYC recordings shall be available on the portal.
Recordings shall be fetched as and when required.
Recordings shall be searchable by date and month.
Recordings shall be visible if searched by LAN.
Users shall be able to upload an Excel or text file with a list of LAN IDs (up to 50) to download recordings.
The system shall trigger a call to the backend API to process the request after file upload.
Results shall be displayed in a tabular format with a "Download All" option.
The table shall have pagination, displaying only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records at a time shall be downloaded.
File upload shall be in CSV/TXT format.
The recording download shall start upon clicking the LAN.
Access to the screen shall be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: Search functionality by LAN ID, date, and month.
Bulk download functionality based on uploaded file.
Display of recording details (User ID, Call Duration, Status, Time, Date, NFS VKYC Upload Time).
non_functional_requirements: The system should be secure and access should be restricted to authorized users.
The system should be available during business hours.
The system should be user-friendly and easy to navigate.
The system should be able to handle a large number of recordings.
Performance: The system should provide quick search and download times.
success_criteria: The portal is successfully deployed and accessible to authorized users.
Users can easily search and download V-KYC recordings.
The time taken to retrieve recordings is significantly reduced.
The number of requests to IT for recordings is reduced.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
Maximum 50 LAN IDs can be uploaded at once.
assumptions: The backend API for processing requests is available and functional.
The necessary infrastructure (server, network) is available.
The V-KYC recordings are consistently stored and accessible on the NFS server.
The LAN IDs are unique and valid.
risks: Technical issues with the NFS server could impact recording retrieval.
Performance issues with the backend API could slow down the process.
Security vulnerabilities could compromise the recordings.
User adoption of the new portal might be slow.

recommendations: Add more details about the backend API.
Specify the security measures to be implemented.

identified_gaps: Lack of detailed information on the backend API.
recommendations_for_completion: Define security protocols and access controls.
Specify error handling and logging mechanisms.
